title: sha test in Big Endian machines

content.raw:
`SHA` test in `Util_TEST` is failing. The custom code that we host in Util.cc is probably not endian safe.

[Bug report in Debian](https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=890383) and [Failure in Ubuntu](https://launchpadlibrarian.net/363119008/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-s390x.ignition-common_1.0.1-1_BUILDING.txt.gz).

Version 1.0.1
```
[ RUN      ] Util_TEST.SHA1
/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/src/Util_TEST.cc:43: Failure
      Expected: precomputedSHA1
      Which is: "913283ec8502ba1423d38a7ea62cb8e492e87b23"
To be equal to: computedSHA1
      Which is: "a8feb717a5a62f6850ba926395431497b6d51897"
```
